pages.text: Botania is a tech mod themed around natural magic, powered by flowers and mana. $(br2)Harness the energy of nature to create powerful devices, automate tasks, and craft mystical items.

Start by crafting a Petal Apothecary and collecting mystical petals from the world. $(br2)Use the Petal Apothecary to craft your first Pure Daisy and generate Livingwood and Livingrock. $(br2)Generate mana using Dayblooms, Nightshades, or Endoflames, then store it in a Mana Pool.

Use mana to craft powerful tools, armor, and gadgets with unique magical effects. $(br2)Challenge the powerful Gaia Guardian and delve into the mysteries of Botania's advanced flora. $(br2)With Botania, magic and technology unite to bring endless possibilities!
